description:
The Koehler Bortnick Team Mobile App is ideal for the house hunter on the go! Instead of mapping out the homes you want to see from your computer, simply download this mobile app to see real-time information about homes for sale in your area of interest.  You can search by listing number, neighborhood, city, zip code, school district, address, or just let the GPS map guide you to your next dream home! 

You will see a home’s price, photos, description of the interior and exterior, and information on similar properties recently sold just to name a few.  You can refine your search by type of home, price range, number of bedrooms and bathrooms, and location.  

The app is free to use.  Let your home shopping adventure begin right from the palm of your hand!
